entry.title: Custom Server for Deepseek & Storage
entry.content:
Introduction

This post details a custom server build designed to run the Deepseek 71B model locally and serve as a high-capacity NAS for project documents. The goal is to provide a cost-effective, high-performance solution using consumer hardware available in Chile, while ensuring compatibility with Deepseek's demanding requirements and enterprise-grade storage needs. This guide is intended for IT professionals, researchers, and organizations interested in deploying advanced AI models and centralized storage on-premises.

Solution Overview

After analyzing Deepseek's hardware requirements (see previous post), I determined that running the 71B model locally requires a system with extremely high GPU VRAM, substantial system RAM, and fast storage. In addition, the server must function as a NAS, allowing secure access to project files from anywhere. The proposed solution leverages high-end consumer components for the best price/performance ratio, but requires careful selection and assembly due to compatibility and supply constraints in the Chilean market.

Parts List Table With GPU (Quick Reference)

Below is a summary table of the recommended components. Each part was chosen for its compatibility with multi-GPU deep learning workloads and large-scale storage. For detailed specs and rationale, see the sections below.

ComponentVendorModel/DescriptionPriceLinkNotes
CPUIntelIntel Core i9 14900K (BX8071514900K)CLP$622990Advantage StoreAvailable at multiple stores
MotherboardMSIMEG Z790 ACECLP$561694Infor Ingen StoreOnly at one store
RAMKingstonFury Beast KF556C40BBK4-128 (4 x 32 GBDIMM DDR5-5600)CLP$424204Wei StoreAvailable at multiple stores
GPUASUSROG-ASTRAL-RTX5090-O32G-GAMING [90YV0LW0-M0AA00]CLP$4114390Centrale StoreOnly one option. Need 2 of these.
SSD (OS)CrucialP3 Plus 1 TB (CT1000P3PSSD8)CLP$72990Winpy StoreAvailable at multiple stores
SSD (Model)CrucialP3 Plus 4 TB (CT4000P3PSSD8)CLP$270990Notebook StoreOnly at one store
HDD (Storage)SeagateIronWolf 12 TB (ST12000VN0008)CLP$306915PC Express Store4 needed. Only at one store
ChassisSegotepEndura Pro+ - WhiteCLP$84990Power Play StoreOnly at one store
PSUFSP GroupCANNON PRO FSP2000-52AGPBI (2000 W)CLP$525263N1G StoreOnly at one store
CoolingGameMaxIceBurg 240 Digital WHCLP$73034Infor Ingen StoreOnly at one store
OtherairMaxCombo Teclado y Mouse GMK-01CLP$9269BIP StoreMany options
info
Total Build Price

As for 2025-05-15, the total build price is CLP$12,101,864

Total Build Price

As for 2025-05-15, the total build price without GPU is CLP$3,863,084

Estimated Electricity Consumption

Build OptionEstimated Power Draw (W)kWh/monthkWh/year
With 2× RTX 5090 GPUs1,6501,20514,460
Without GPU5003654,444
example
Assumptions
  • "With GPU" estimate is based on previous calculations for a dual RTX 5090 build under full load (Own cost-risk assessment: 1,650W).
  • "Without GPU" estimate is based on typical component draw for the listed parts, excluding GPUs (approx. 500W continuous load).
  • Both assume 24/7 operation. Actual usage will vary with workload and power-saving features.

Parts in Specific

CPU Options

Intel Core i9 14900K (BX8071514900K)

  • 3.2 Ghz base, 5.2 Ghz boost
  • 24 cores
  • 32 threads
  • 36 MB cache
  • Socket FCLGA1700 (BX8071514900K)
  • Accepts ECC DDR-5600 dual channel
  • Advantage Store
  • PC Express Store
  • Winpy Store
  • SPDigital Store
info
Price

CLP$622990

Motherboard Options

warning
Observation

The motherboard to choose must consider that ideally 2 GPU RTX5090 will be installed, as the Deepseek 71b model requires 2 RTX5090s to run locally. Therefore it is also important to note that the motherboard must have at least 2 PCIe 5.0 x16 slots.

MSI MEG Z790 ACE (Allows 2 RTX5090)

  • Fabricante: MSI
  • Socket: LGA 1700
  • Chipset: Intel Z790 (LGA 1700)
  • Slots memorias: 4x DDR5
  • Canales memoria: Dual channel
  • Formato: Extended ATX
  • Soporte RGB
    • 3x ARGB Programable (Addressable RGB / 3-pin / 5V)
    • 1x RGB Simple (4-pin / 12V)
  • Puertos de video
    • 2x Mini DisplayPort
  • Puertos de energía
    • 1x 24 pines (Motherboard)
    • 2x 8 pines (CPU)
  • Especificaciones secundarias
    • Soporte SLI: No
    • Soporte CrossFire: No
    • Soporte RAID: Sí
    • Conectores:
      • 1x M.2 22110 (PCIe 4.0 x4)
      • 1x M.2 22110 (PCIe 4.0 x4 / SATA 3 (6.0 Gb/s))
      • 1x M.2 2280 (PCIe 4.0 x4)
      • 1x M.2 2280 (PCIe 4.0 x4 / SATA 3 (6.0 Gb/s))
      • 1x M.2 2280 (PCIe 5.0 x4)
    • 6x SATA (SATA 3 (6.0 Gb/s))
  • Puertos
    • 2x Antenna Connector WI-FI 6 (802.11ax)
    • 1x BIOS Flashback button
    • 1x Clear CMOS button
    • 2x RJ45
    • 1x S/PDIF (óptico)
    • 2x Thunderbolt 4
    • 7x USB 3.2 Gen 2 (USB 3.2)
    • 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 (USB 3.2) Type-C
  • Expansiones
    • 1x PCI Express 4.0 x16
    • 2x PCI Express 5.0 x16
  • Infor Ingen Store
info
Price

CLP$561694

RAM Options (DDR5)

warning
Observation

The RAM to choose must consider ideally 128GB to be installed, as the Deepseek 71b model requires this amount to run locally.

HDD Options (Storage)

info
Observation

For the storage it is considered to have 32TB configured in RAID yet to be defined. Therefore 4 HDD of either 10TB or 12TB are considered.
